scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter shell-app dev" "pnpm --filter header-mfe dev" "pnpm --filter left-nav-mfe dev" "pnpm --filter cart-mfe dev" "pnpm --filter orders-mfe dev" "pnpm --filter profile-mfe dev"
scripts.build: pnpm build:mfes && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm --filter shell-app build
scripts.build:mfes: pnpm --filter header-mfe build && pnpm --filter left-nav-mfe build && pnpm --filter cart-mfe build && pnpm --filter orders-mfe build && pnpm --filter profile-mfe build
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p apps/shell-app/public/header-mfe && cp -r apps/header-mfe/dist/* apps/shell-app/public/header-mfe/ && mkdir -p apps/shell-app/public/left-nav-mfe && cp -r apps/left-nav-mfe/dist/* apps/shell-app/public/left-nav-mfe/
